vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in W_WALLET.Collect (patch_4.sol#26-33):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_4.sol#29-32)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_4.sol#30)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: msg in Log.AddMessage (patch_4.sol#52) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-builtin
vulnerability_findings.message: Log.AddMessage.msg (local variable @ patch_4.sol#52) shadows built-in symbol "msg"
